titleInfo.title: The CBC Chorale presents A Concert of Christmas Carols

mods.abstract: Featuring Marian Shaffer, harpist, the CBC Chorale put on a lengthy program of Christmas carols and seasonal music, including Benjamin Britten's "Ceremony of Carols."
